datapipes.factory¶

Contains the overall factory definition.

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

Factory()

Factory decorator class for client algorithms configured to subscribe to the DataPipes PubSub network.
datapipes.factory._LOGGER¶
class datapipes.factory.Factory¶

Factory decorator class for client algorithms configured to subscribe to the DataPipes PubSub network. Decorate your algorithm class with your algorithm name like so:

@Factory.register(‘your_algorithm_name’) class your_algorithm_name():

Parameters

Name – The name of the class/funcation/algorithm being decorated. Must match the config.py reference.

Returns

The client decorated object registered with DataPipes PubSub network.

Return type

Instantiated Class Object

Name¶

String

Instantiated Class Object

<Client Class Object>

__registry¶
__temp_obj¶
static notify(self)¶

Adds the method ‘notify’ to the decorated client class

static attach(self)¶

Adds the method ‘attach’ to the decorated client class

static detach(self)¶

Adds the method ‘detach’ to the decorated client class

classmethod register(cls, name: str = None)¶

Class method to register the client algorithm to the internal registry. Decorate your algorithm class with your algorithm name like so:

@Factory.register(‘your_algorithm_name’) class your_algorithm_name():

classmethod create(cls, *args, **kwargs)¶

Factory command to create the client decorated object for connection to the DataPipes PubSub network.

Parameters

  • *args – Allows the client to pass any series of separate initialization veriables to the constructor.

  • **kwargs – Allows the client to pass an initialization dictionary to the constructor.

Returns

An instance of the client algorithm class.
